transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan Nagraj ji, piyu mat karo sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan sir bataiye sir aapne parso call kiya tha aapne.
Customer: Wo return ke liye bola hai sir maine sir ko to
Customer: Koi baat hi samajhne tayar nahi hai. Maine bola company mein bhi baat kiya company wale bolte hai koi baat nahi yani ke return to de sakte hai hum barobar.
Hmm.
Customer: Lekin wo Abdul Kadir jo hai wo na wo mana kar rahe hai.
Executive: Kab last baat hui aapki?
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Kab last baat hui aapki last?
Customer: Parso baat hui thi unse.
Executive: Kya bol the final?
Customer: Wo bolte hai ke video chat karo wo karo. Maine bola mere ko ab nahi karna business barobar sir to mera payment mere ko refund dila do. Us din bhi inhone baat boli thi ke ab aapke nahi karna to koi baat nahi.
Executive: To abhi aap use kar rahe ho ya use karna band kar diya hai aapne?
Customer: Kya maza hi nahi aata sir ko order aa to main business karu na yaar kuch bhi order hi nahi aa teen mahine se. Abhi bhi subah mein bhi ek lead padi lead uthai.
Hmm.
Customer: To lead uthane ke baad jo product apne pass available nahi hai party wo product mangti hai. To koi matlab nahi na yaar business karke yaar.
Executive: Lead pe kya likha tha?
Customer: Lead mein likha tha crystal tree. Weise hi jo aati hai to wo party bolti hai ki mere ko waisi wali nahi chahiye mere ko lighting wali chahiye. To apna thodi lighting wala electric ka thodi business hai sir apna. Lighting wali mein dunga unko. Jo business hai wahi business karunga na main.
Executive: Nahi bilkul sahi hai sir specification ki thodi dikkat hoti hai unko dusre wala junction chahiye hoga.
Customer: Are nahi wo lighting wala bola mere ko malum nahi.
Hmm.
Executive: Ek kaam karo sir aap complaint dalo ke uh mere ko return chahiye barobar aap complaint dal do.
Customer: Sir main keh raha hu jaise abhi aapka ye wala isme aath das din to ho hi gaye hai theek hai. Aap isko 10-15 din aur dekh lo.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi mere ko nahi dekhna maine dekh liya aadhi mahina hua hai yaar mere ko nahi dekhna yaar. Abhi teen mahine ka hua hai sir agar nahi nahi nahi do mahina nahi mere ko nahi dekhna aage yaar mere ko aage bhi wahi masla hoga mere ko malum hai yaar.
Customer: Aur se badh ke fas gaya yaar main to. Mere ko return dilwa do aap mere ko nahi karna business fir baad mein main dekhunga abhi nahi karna mere ko jab market khulega tab karwaunga main.
Executive: Achcha kisne bola tha waise ki return ho jayega yahan se bola tha kisi ne?
Customer: Aapki company ne bola aapki company ne bola.
Executive: Ha parso maine call kiya tha company mein bhi lagaya tha uske baad Abdul Kadir ko lagaya tha aapki company ne bola maine bola ke sir aapki company mein return ho sakta ha kya koi baat nahi ho sakta hai.
Executive: Lekin wo reason hi nahi batate ke inko ye ye taklif hai wo taklif hai wo to bolte hai video chat karo wo karo agar chalo video chat bhi karenge to ho jayega yaar sir.
Executive: Aap ek baar kar lijiye video chat to uske liye fir hum ye bhi dal denge kyuki wo nahi sir mere ko nahi karna.
Executive: Fir usi pe jaake baat atak jati hai sir ke aage laga do ne.
Customer: Aage laga do ne.
Customer: Mara bhai mare ma dhandhan jovanu ne yaar.
Customer: Bahu baki yaar.
Customer: Aa badha ahiya j muke che yaar.
Customer: Ha bhai muki do tamari vaat.
Customer: Ek vakhat e lehu muki do.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Main keh raha hu Nagraj ek final kar lo na agar main aapke jaake dekh lunga to main ye bhi update kar paunga.
Customer: Nahi sir mere ko nahi karna sir maine aapko dhokha do bol diya mere ko nahi karna sir business mere ko return dila do aap.
Executive: Usi ke liye keh raha hu main ek baar dekh lunga to main ye bhi update kar paunga ki maine video call bhi kar liya maine khud dekh liya ki facility wagera kaisi aati hai.
Customer: Nahi sir mere ko nahi karna sir kuch bhi aap mere ko return ka dal do option dal do waha pe ke sir mere ko nahi karna business yaar.
Executive: Isme main bhi pareshan hu aap bhi pareshan ho yaar mere maine bhi kisi ke pass se uchi udhar karke naya business dale hai yaar mere ko laga ke ho jayega wasul ye to wasul hone ka naam hi nahi hai yaha pe.
Executive: Sare customer interested rahega to koi customer nahi rahega interested.
Customer: Nahi koi customer nahi pakda raha hai buyer koi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Koi buyer nahi aa raha hai. Sab daav pech wale buyer aa rahe hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Hmm.
Customer: Lead padta hai call logo ko call lagate to vyast aata hai fir lead padta hai call lagate to bhai yaar maine to nahi kiya tha waisa aisa hai yaar aise thodi na sir business hota hai yaar.
Executive: To aap proper use kar rahe ho main main proper use kar rahe hai use kaun kar raha hai proper?
Customer: Nahi main kar raha hu main jyada kar raha hu use wo nahi karte unka mobile bigda hua hai. Hmm. Wo nahi karte.
Executive: Ek baar sir aa jao video meet pe main keh raha hu ki nahi sir mere ko karna hi nahi hai sir kuch nahi karna hai.
Executive: Main us main business purpose ke liye main complaint bhi dalunga to uske liye to main aap bas mere ko return dila do mere ko nahi karna yaar main kitni baar aapko bolu yaar. Main bhi pareshan hu aap bhi pareshan ho mere ko kisi ko pareshan karne ka ye nahi hai yaar.
Executive: Main keh raha hu sir return ke liye to process main keh raha hu.
Customer: Ha to aap return are dal are sir aisa nahi yaar aap bol do na ke party ko nahi buyer nahi mil rahe wo hisab se aap dal do na yaar.
Executive: Aap paanch minute ke liye isme join kar lo.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Are nahi sir nahi are yaar do minute ke liye bhi nahi karna mere ko.
Executive: Chaliye main dal do aapke complaint laage sir.
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Dal du main aapki complaint laage sir. Haan complaint dal do aage nahi karna mere ko IndiaMART pe business yaar.
Executive: Theek hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the subscription.

- Not getting genuine buyers.

- Facing issues with leads.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to join a video meet.

- Agreed to file a complaint for the customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, complaint
